text:
February IB, 1957
Dr, Maurice F, Seay
Director
Division of Education
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Maurice:
Thanks for your letter of February 12. I've
sent copies of it to Burton Paulu and Frank
Schooley for a consultation by mail. If they
suggest any questions to ask you, I'll pass
them on. I believe there will be some salary
changes, which have been forwarded to Frank
Schooley for diversity consideration before
forwarding to yo .. I will check with him
later in the week, and you should hear from
one of us on this.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
HJS/hek
cc: F. F. Schooley
Burton Paulu
